TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS EASTERN CORP <TET> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr profit three cts vs profit 36 cts Net profit 1,800,000 vs profit 19.2 mln Nine mths Shr profit 1.22 dlrs vs loss 44 cts Net 64.7 mln vs loss 23.5 mln NOTE: 1986 3rd qtr and nine months includes a profit of 2.8 mln dlrs and a loss of 66.7 mln dlrs from discontinued operations. Earnings per share are reported after payment of preferred stock dividends of subsidiaries. Reuter
